attributes.action: Declare EU referendum result void because of lies and false claims.
attributes.background:
Notable claims were, £350 million to go to the NHS instead of the EU. 

EU regional funds continue followed by Government funds, (false Government funding claim).

Ukip claimed millions of Turkish nationals arriving in the UK imminently, (Turkey in EU is 30 years away).

rejection.details: The open petition similar to yours is https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/139789
